results.definition: having or marked by confidence or assurance
examples: his manner is more confident these days
were convinced that it would be to their advantage to join
I am positive he is lying

results.definition: not liable to error in judgment or action
examples: most surefooted of the statesmen who dealt with the depression"- Walter Lippman
demonstrates a surefooted storytelling talent"- Michiko Kakutani
